description:
Following their fierce genjutsu battle with the Sharingan, Itachi explains the secret behind the most powerful ocular jutsu, the Mangekyo Sharingan, and the history of the Uchiha clan…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ombre et la lumière du sharingan
Luce e tenebre dello Sharingan ipnotico
Mangekyou Sharingan no Hikari to Yami
The Light & Dark of the Mangekyo Sharingan
万華鏡写輪眼の光と闇
